entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 03:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning before morning. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and a few snow squalls ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
